text: The Enemy Within is a fantasy horror novel by Christie Golden, set in the world of Ravenloft, and based on the Dungeons & Dragons game. ==Plot summary== Sir Tristan Hiregaard periodically transforms into Malken, an evil beastly creature who controls a large criminal empire. Tristan is terrified by these transformations, and sets out to destroy his evil side. ==Reception== ==Reviews== *Review by Don D'Ammassa (1994) in Science Fiction Chronicle, #172 April & May 1994http://www.isfdb.org/cgi-bin/title.cgi?18112 ==References== Category:1994 American novels Category:Novels by Christie Golden Category:Ravenloft novels
